description: Discover the best hotels in Yulara, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: 5-Star Uluru Glamping with All-Inclusive Dining, Drinks & Airport Transfers
hotels.description: Marvel at the majestic beauty of Uluru with a once-in-a-lifetime stay at the spectacular Longitude 131°. Nestled among the rich red dunes of Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park, Longitude 131° is a bucket-list destination, a safari-style luxe retreat promising guests an unforgettable escape amid the impressive outback scenery. Engage in a unique Australian dining experience with a stunning desert backdrop, and explore the natural wonders of the Northern Territory. Each intimate tent and pavilion offers expansive, uninterrupted views of Uluru and Kata Tjuta; a truly unparalleled opportunity to connect with Australia's gorgeous Red Centre.

seo.title: Hotels in Yulara - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
